author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour Weekend full episode October 24, 2015
text: On this edition for Saturday, October 24th, 2015, Hurricane Patricia makes landfall in Mexico then weakens rapidly, in our signature segment, women fleeing domestic violence in Honduras hope for safe harbor in the U.S., and a bill to protect hacked corporations from lawsuits makes its way through Congress. William Brangham anchors from New York.
